conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C and D. Predict which container (E, F, G or H) it will flow into after passing through baffles.

conclusion: Liquid from A flows into container E.

premise: Liquid from B flows down to the white baffle.

conclusion: Liquid from B flows into container F.

premise: Liquid from C flows down to the white baffle.

conclusion: Liquid from C flows into container G.

premise: Liquid from D flows down to the brown baffle.

conclusion: Liquid from D flows into container H.

premise: Final Answer: A flows into container E. B flows into container F. C flows into container G. D flows into container H.
conclusion: Final Answer: A flows into container E. B flows into container F. C flows into container G. D flows into container H.
